title: Unity Catalog CI/CD: Automating Packaging and Listing Updates
summary: Automate packaging, evidence export, and Marketplace listing refresh via CI/CD.
bodyMd:
## Pipeline
- Build artifacts and Delta OPTIMIZE
- Run benchmarks; export evidence
- Package zip (manifest + SBOM + evidence)
- Push to UC; update listing

## Gates
Fail closed on utility/privacy thresholds.
